en: Teachers of the Howard Institute, Mt. Pleasant, Tennessee

Yellowed newspaper clipping of teachers from the Howard Institute.  From Left to Right-front row: Mary Kindell (Mrs. Ollie Rippey), Helen Bostick (Mrs. Frank Ordway), Nita Cooper (Mrs. Floyd Kelton), Eula Chapman (Mrs. Olie Williams), second row: Myrtle Duke, Amy Williams (Mrs. Charles Irwin), Anna Brooks, Fannie Bostick (Mrs. J.C. Bayers), Edua Oliver, and Sara Lanius (Mrs. J.C. Caldwell).
Era 7 - The Emergence of Modern America (1890-1930)

Yellowed newspaper clipping of teachers from the Howard Institute. Bayers), Edua Oliver, and Sara Lanius (Mrs. J.C. Caldwell).
